name: Calmcraft
description:
Calmcraft was created in less than 24 hours for the Minecraft in 24 hrs Jam.

Its a 'creative mode' voxel sandbox, there is no inventory or resource limit, you are free to reshape the world as you please.

The game will automatically save when you close it and reload the previous world when opening, use the "Reset Data" control to generate a fresh world.

---   PLAYER CONTROLS   ---

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Mouse - Look
Left Mouse Button - Destroy
Right Mouse Button - Place
Scroll - Switch block type

---   OTHER CONTROLS   ---

F1 - Toggle FPS
F2 - Toggle Anti-aliasing
Ctrl + R - Reset Data
Alt + Enter - Toggle Fullscreen
Escape - Quit

Created with GameMaker Studio 2

SFX - Kenney
